step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Ensure you feel a gentle resistance to help pump lymph.
You're doing well keeping your arm overhead. Focus on maintaining this position throughout the movement.
Great job opening your hand and fingers wide. This helps prepare for the pumping action.
Excellent! You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Keep up the strong effort.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm up, open your hand wide, and then make a fist while breathing in. This helps move fluid effectively.
